reviews.customers_say: Customers find this turtleneck sweater well-made and comfortable, particularly noting it's not too tight around the neck and works well in cold to warm weather. Customers consider it good value for money.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ultra soft, very finely woven and perfect for layering
items.body: This is a very lightweight, fine gauge sweater that is ultra soft, warm and cozy. I purposely got it oversized because I like a loose, roomy fit and love the way it feels on my skin. This is a perfect weight for layering if you need something for the holidays as being a classic style, you can always dress it up with accessories after you shed your winter outerwear. The ONLY thing that I would change is putting the tags at the neck down along a side seam so that it doesn't irritate the back of my neck, which might just be a 'me' thing, but I really don't like tags back there. Along the low side seam is a better placement, imho, otherwise, a fantastic classic piece to add to my wardrobe at a very reasonable price point. I hope that helps! Read more
items.author: Ema Nnep

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Affordable, Cozy, and Surprisingly Stylish — A Must-Have Everyday Sweater
items.body: I was pleasantly surprised by this Amazon Essentials sweater as it’s one of those rare pieces that hits the perfect balance between comfort, quality, and style without breaking the bank. The fabric feels soft against the skin but still has enough structure to hold its shape, and the knit is thick enough to be cozy without feeling bulky. What sets this sweater apart from other basic pullovers I’ve tried is the cut and attention to detail. The fit is flattering without being tight, the sleeves drape nicely, and it layers well over shirts or under jackets. I’ve worn it for casual outings, to the office, and even at home for lounging, and it looks polished in every setting. After multiple washes, the sweater has held its color and shape beautifully with no pilling, no shrinkage, and still soft as ever. For the price point, it’s an exceptional value that easily competes with much more expensive brands. If you’re looking for a reliable, stylish, and versatile sweater that won’t disappoint, this is a piece I can confidently recommend. I’ve even considered buying it in another color because it’s that good. Read more
items.author: Michelle Kim

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice overall layering piece
items.body: Nice light weight turtleneck. Will be great for layering under blazer, vest or cardigan. Runs true to size. The camel is a nice neutral color. Neck is not tight. Stays in place and not too high when folded down. Read more
items.author: Jane Scrivens

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft-Well made-Wardrobe Staple for Fall & Winter!
items.body: Amazon Essentials Women's Lightweight-Long-Sleeve-High Turtleneck Sweater in Black arrived today. The top was packaged in shrink wrap and then in an outer brown, paper bag. Upon removal, the sweater did not have any smell from the plastic packaging. Surprisingly, the sweater was not very wrinkled. I will wash this in cold water and hang dry. I purchased the XXL size. I am 5’ and 175#’s. The sweater fits close to the body but does not cling to this real women’s lumps and bumps. I am usually cold and will wear this high turtleneck sweater under a barn jacket or a jean jacket or a flannel button down shirt this Fall & Winter. The material is very soft and not at all scratchy when on the body. Black is a great neutral and the sweater can be dressed up with real or costume jewelry. It may be worn under a wool pea coat; short puffer jacket; a motorcycle jacket; long sweater; blazers; etc.. This will be a wardrobe staple in women of all ages wardrobes. The price is ultra competitive and I would urge you to try the Amazon Brand Fisherman's Sweater and the Cable Knit Sweater. For those in the Midwest or Up North or in countries with harsh winters- these turtleneck sweaters will become invaluable because they are so versatile. The price is great so buying a neutral and maybe a couple of colors on the Amazon Marketplace will be easy. These sweaters would make lovely gifts for the Holidays or a Fall/Winter Birthday or a Just because gift for that special someone in your life. Great quality and value and very versatile sweater. Highly Recommend. Two thumbs way Up. Thanks Amazon. :) Read more
items.author: BobbieTX2

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect turtle neck sweater
items.body: The sage green color in photo doesn't do it justice. Color is actually a very pretty light aqua-y green shade. Still in its packaging, this top looked like an expensive silk sweater. On, even more so. Fabric is soft and good quality, turtle neck is comfortable and not tight. Sweater is airy and light, but not see through. The perfect layering piece. Length hits about 28" on me as I am abt 5'4" and large chested and i chose the XL. Which is my true top size and it fits fine, right where i need it to be. I was comfortable in this sweater in a 75 degree environment without getting too hot. It's not overly stretchy, so order your current size. As I am full-figured the upper arm sleeves fit snugly, but not tight; but the arm seam doesn't stretch so here's hoping it won't shrink. I will be ordering more colors, especially this same sage color. Good job Amazon! I highly recommend this sweater! Read more
items.author: Starfish

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Ivory color size not fit well
items.body: I'm a fan of turtle neck sweaters. This is my first time to buy them on line. I bought many pieces of different color each. Most of them are true to the size, except for the ivory color. I am size S, The ivory size S runs very long (reaching mid of butt) and loose. There is no waist line fit, but just look like a loose cylinder. The eyelets are loose which make it feel thin to the touch. I don't think it can keep me warm. However, the rest of colors are true to the size (reaching upper hips as you can see on the models) and look good with waist line cutting. When I was wondering how come the same size S fit so dramatically different, I realized that the ivory color is made in Vietnam, and all of the rest I bought were made in Bangaladesh and China. I already cut the labels and couldn't return the ivory ones. Though, I am still happy with the rest . Read more
items.author: 1st time mom with one boy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice layering piece.
items.body: Nice layering piece. The off white is a nice neutral, not too yellow as often happens. Fits closer to body than many other size mediums but makes it great for layering under other sweaters, cardigans or jackets. Nice weight. Good price. May get another color. I would suggest sizing up if you want to wear this as a stand alone sweater. Does shrink some after washing but no pilling. Read more
items.author: Wise Shopper

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for the price
items.body: Fits perfectly if not a little big. Comfortable. Washes extremely well. Looks expensive. Great for layering under a jacket or wearing alone Read more
items.author: Ginger lover

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.
about_this_item:

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Black Camel Rugby Stripe, Indigo Blue Heather, Camel Navy Placed Stripe, Forest Green, Taupe Heather, Bright Pink, Camel Heather, Light Grey Heather, Burgundy, Black, Sage Green Heather, Cornflower Blue, Dark Red, Olive. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
